https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/6S9tjScUfIwWgzIudzDLjNsSjGN.jpg A pack of friends in Denver's gay bear community go for the camping trip of a life time filled with fun, laughs and a hot encounter. It all seems innocent enough until a rampaging sociopath joins them ensuring a trip they'll never forget. Bear Creek
